item.title: My First YouTube Video!
item.description: The Pop Out Link to heading I have been watching YouTube for my entire life. Studying, Laughing, Learning. I watch it more than TV. Today, I took another step in my content creation journey with by releasing my first video! It’s definetly me doing my best Super GT impression, but I’m proud of how it turned out. Click the picture below to check out the video! Behind the Scenes Link to heading I’ve been Sim Racing for over a year now.

item.title: HANDS ON KEYS
item.description: What is HANDS ON KEYS? Link to heading HANDS ON KEYS is a tech blog for developers. I’m hoping to provide as much value to developers as I possibly can, and will do so from a “hands on” perspective. This will also allow me to get more reps as a technical communicator, story teller, and developer! Current Status Link to heading I’m in the process now of brainstorming topics to write about.

item.title: Movie Review: MaXXXine
item.description: MaXXXine Link to heading MaXXXine is a 2024 thriller film written, directed, produced, and edited by Ti West. This is the thrid film in the trilogy, and I am a big fan of the first two. So much so, I decided to treat the night as a double feature, and watched Pearl beforehand. I was really excited walking into the theatre for this one! Thoughts on MaXXXine Link to heading I loved it.

item.title: 10 Questions About Me
item.description: 1. What’s your favorite quality about yourself? Link to heading I'm Spontaneous 2. What’s something you’re really bad at? Link to heading Chemistry 3. What do you look for when finding new friends? Link to heading Authenticity 4. Do you believe in astrology? Why or why not? Link to heading "Believe" is a strong word, but it's onto something. Shoutout to my May Gemini's ♊ 5. Which celebrity would you choose as a mentor?

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email me: noah@arkdatastudios.com Link to heading LinkedIn me: LinkedIn Link to heading

item.title: Projects
item.description: “Side projects + hobbies are important” - Austin Kleon Link to heading My Side Projects: Link to heading Personal website - noah-pitts.github.io Animations with Manim - Animate-With-Manim Sattelite Image Timelapses - Satellite-Image-Timelapse Introduction to the Cloud - Welcome-to-the-Cloud Building ARK DATA STUDIOS (site in pre-alpha) - arkdatastudios.com I’m also learning to draw and how to write like a good engineer. All of these things are a Work-In-Progress (WIP), so ill be updating them as life/ my day job allows!
